inclusion.criterion: Traditional Donor Selection Criteria Met - acceptable for transplantation per usual
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previously enrolled in IRB 2016P002051 and experienced primary graft nonfunction due to renal vein thrombosis and acute thrombotic microangiopathy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willig and able to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Donor has been known to have previously received and failed HCV treatment with a direct-acting antiviral agent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Confirmed HBV positive (surface antigen or HBV DNA positive)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Kidney anatomical damage or significant pathology noted during recovery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant liver disease or signs of liver decompensation (splenomegaly, ascites) noted during recovery (advanced fibrosis or cirrhosis)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any standard contra-indication to donation noted in donor (significant malignancy, unusual infection)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis with recurrent C diff infections. She was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks.
